snippet.title: Need for Speed: ProStreet - Pepega Edition | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The next Pepega Mod will be coming to NFS ProStreet in 2022! 
Race your way through all-new race organizations and kings on completely redone tracks and locations! Move your way up from shitboxes and meme-cars to modern classics and concept cars!  Dominate new Race Days featuring completely new event types on your way to become the Pepega King!

• Revamped Career Mode featuring new Kings, Races and Organizations
• Over 100 Customizable Cars - from Shitboxes to Concept Cars - featuring the beloved Autosculpt and full-fledged damage models
• Improved Graphics through better reflections, colors and more
• New Event Types, such as Sprint Run: Try to get the best time on a short sprint over the course of three runs!
• Redesigned Engine Sounds and new Announcers
• New Tuning Options, such a Drivetrain Swaps - now any car can pull off a wheelie!
• Major improvements to handling, balancing and bug fixes


Pepega Edition Merch: https://www.redbubble.com/people/TeamPepega/shop?asc=u
Join the Discord for News & Updates: https://discord.com/invite/YbFadBv
Download & More Info : https://pepegamod.com/
